ing: 1 (3 ounce) package instant vanilla pudding mix
des: "A nice refreshing fruit dip.  A great way to get kids to eat fruit!  Can be used as a fruit topping by adding more yogurt -- blueberries are hard to dip! Use any flavor of yogurt desired."
ins: In a medium bowl, mix the vanilla pudding mix, sour cream and yogurt. Chill in the refrigerator at least 2 hours before serving.
